attributes.action: limit young drivers to driving a small engined car (1600cc) for three years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I know some young drivers who have rediculously fast cars, having only recently passing their test. They are much to fast for them to handle safely without proper experience.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
